data.title: Marc Anthony's ex-girlfriends and wives: Who has he dated?
data.meta_description: GLOBAL SUPERSTAR Marc Anthony has been married four times.His latest marriage is to model and Miss Universe contestant Nadia Ferreira.Who has Marc Ant
data.text:
GLOBAL SUPERSTAR Marc Anthony has been married four times.

His latest marriage is to model and Miss Universe contestant Nadia Ferreira.

Who has Marc Anthony dated?

Marc Anthony is an American singer and popular Latin artist.

He has dated and even married multiple women during his life.

His first wife was Puerto Rican actress Dayanara Torres, to whom he was married from 2000 to 2004.

Following his marriage to Torres, he moved on and married megastar Jennifer Lopez in 2004.

Lopez and Anthony were married for 10 years, but the former couple divorced in 2014.

The ex-couple met while working together as they collaborated on the song No Me Ames in 1999, Insiderreports.

After his long marriage to Lopez, the singer moved on and eventually married Shannon De Lima, in 2014.

De Lima and Anthony were married for a total of three years before they officially divorced in 2017.

Anthony also dated Debbie Rosado for some time back in the 1990s, US Weekly reports.

Although Rosado and Anthony never married, they do share two children.

How many kids does Marc Anthony have?

The famous singer has had six children with the many women in his life.

He welcomed his first two children with his ex Rosado, in 1994.

Rosado and Anthony's children include Ariana and Chase.

Following his split with Rosado, Anthony went on to have another two children with his first wife Torres.

Torres and Anthony have two children Cristian and Ryan, born in 2001 and 2003.

In February 2008, Anthony and Lopez welcomed their twins into their family. The twins are named Emme and Maximilian Muñiz.

On Valentine's Day 2024, Anthony and his current wife announced they were expecting a child together.

The baby will be her first and the singer's seventh child.

Who is Marc Anthony's wife, Nadia Ferreira?

Marc Anthony and Nadia Ferreira revealed the news of their engagement on May 12, 2022.

Anthony's then-fiancée posted her engagement ring on her Instagram story.

Ferreira was born on May 10, 1999, in Villarrica, Paraguay, and is known for representing the country in the 2021 Miss Universe pageant.

Anthony and Ferreira, who are 31 years apart, are often pictured together on their Instagrams.

The two made it official on January 28, 2023, in a star-studded Miami ceremony.
